room_title: Escape room "Shipwrecked" by Chamber Escapes in Miami
review: I want to Thank Todd and Sean for and great experience. Had our group of cheer leaders in for some team bonding. They had thd best time talked about ot all day. Will going back for a parent night out. If your looking for a great group bonding this is the place to go.

room_title: Escape room "Shipwrecked" by Chamber Escapes in Miami
review: Went with a group of my friends. We did the pirate room! It was SO much fun! Todd is so welcoming and explains how everything works before you start. The rooms are decorated and the game is so creative! I have not laughed and had this much fun in a long time! Thank you Todd for such a wonderful memory with my friends and I!

room_title: Escape room "Shipwrecked" by Chamber Escapes in Miami
review: Never been to an escape room but this one was an amazing experience. Will definitely go back and try out the murder mystery one and the car one Todd told us about. Owner is a great host. Felt really excited throughout the whole hour. My coworkers and I beat the game with just barely a minute left. Best going away night with my team. Thanks Todd for this awesome memory!!!
